reviewText: All of these videos are great
My son loves these.... watches them over and over.
My son watched this over and over again for about a month.  Usually if I buy him an educational video he sniffs it out as boring instantly.  Not these Magic School Bus ones
I have had great service.  My children have watched this more than once and have learned new things from this.
It is Magic School Bus. A great addition to our solar system study. Kids love it. They will watch it just for fun! If we only had field trips like that in school :)
Grand children are in home schooling , I buy these for their classroom . I have all that I could find from Amazon  and the library .I also get them dvd's on the history  and animal planet .
My nephews love these just like I did growing up.  Thank you for helping keep these alive in this world

I enjoyed watching this a kid growing up and decided to get it for my son.  I was surprised by the lack of a decent picture.  It's very fuzzy and of a really poor quality. Although I think they are a great series I probably will be unlikely to purchase any more unless the quality of the picture is improved.
We love Magic School Bus episodes. When we added this DVD to our collection, we spent almost a whole day watching it over and over. Guess we are MSB-fan-atics!
